evolution to the -> human : 1
the human need -> for : 1
human need for -> a : 1

for a task -> they : 1
a task they -> joyfully : 1

and vic are -> avid : 1
vic are avid -> doubles : 1
are avid doubles -> tennis : 1
avid doubles tennis -> generally : 1
doubles tennis generally -> enjoy : 1
tennis generally enjoy -> the : 1
generally enjoy the -> outdoor : 1

life in and -> travel : 1
in and travel -> the : 1
and travel the -> world : 1
travel the world -> as : 1

as often as -> they : 1
often as they -> stenger : 1
as they stenger -> maintains : 1
they stenger maintains -> a : 1
stenger maintains a -> popular : 1
maintains a popular -> web : 1
a popular web -> site : 1
popular web site -> thousand : 1

thousand hits per -> where : 1

where much of -> his : 1
